identity.description:
Creates a directed graph of tool relationships by analyzing data flow compatibility among provided tool configurations.

Generates a directed tool relationship graph among provided tool configs using ToolRelationshipDetector to infer data-flow compatibility.
capabilities: Processes a list of tool configuration objects
Saves the resulting graph to a JSON file
Supports configurable processing limits and checkpoints

max_tools.description: Optional max number of tools to process (debug)

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)
